content.html: Spending months doing mostly technical project management has obliterated my confidence to actually write, and make changes to, code. I find myself asking others "Hey can I just do this / add this / change this?" when the answer is just "Yes, that is your job Samathy."
content.value:
Spending months doing mostly technical project management has obliterated my confidence to actually write, and make changes to, code.

I find myself asking others "Hey can I just do this / add this / change this?" when the answer is just "Yes, that is your job Samathy."
